courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Light breeze with little impact on running. Some snow or meltwater on the surface may cause slipperiness. Trail running shoes or shoes with good grip are recommended. Air quality is good with little impact on running. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
